005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.selection;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.control.catalog.IControl;
010
011import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
012
013import java.util.Arrays;
014import java.util.Set;
015import java.util.function.Function;
016import java.util.stream.Collectors;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019
020public interface IControlSelectionFilter extends Function<IControl, Pair<Boolean, Boolean>> {
021
022  @NonNull
023  Pair<Boolean, Boolean> NON_MATCH = ObjectUtils.notNull(Pair.of(false, false));
024  @NonNull
025  Pair<Boolean, Boolean> MATCH = ObjectUtils.notNull(Pair.of(true, true));
026
027  @NonNull
028  IControlSelectionFilter ALL_MATCH = control -> MATCH;
029
030  @NonNull
031  IControlSelectionFilter NONE_MATCH = control -> NON_MATCH;
032
033  @NonNull
034  static IControlSelectionFilter matchIds(@NonNull String... identifiers) {
035    return new IControlSelectionFilter() {
036      private final Set<String> keys = Arrays.stream(identifiers).collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableSet());
037
038      @Override
039      public @NonNull Pair<Boolean, Boolean> apply(IControl control) {
040        return ObjectUtils.notNull(Pair.of(keys.contains(control.getId()), false));
041      }
042
043    };
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Determines if the control is matched by this filter. This method returns a
048   * {@link Pair} where the first member of the pair indicates if the control
049   * matches, and the second indicates if the match applies to child controls as
050   * well.
051   *
052   * @param control
053   *          the control to check for a match
054   * @return a pair indicating the status of the match ({@code true} for a match
055   *         or {@code false} otherwise), and if a match applies to child controls
056   */
057  @NonNull
058  @Override
059  Pair<Boolean, Boolean> apply(IControl control);
060}
